articles.title: Euro 2020 matchday LIVE: North Macedonia vs Netherlands, Finland vs Belgium updates, news & TV reaction - Goal India
articles.description: The 2021 Euros feature 24 teams vying for the European Championship for national teams. The tournament starts off with a round-robin group stage followed by knockout rounds through the final on July 11. Check out the latest standings and results.

articles.title: The Crown and Poldark could be scythed from European TV screens as EU targets ‘post-Brexit imperialism’ - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Hit shows made in Britain labelled a threat ‘cultural diversity’, as Brussels plans to limit their appearances on TV and streaming services
articles.content:
Britain has hit back at an EU plan to slash the disproportionate number of British TV and films shown in Europe. 
The European Commission has been asked to carry out an impact study on the risk of B… [+832 chars]
